text:
[Verse]
Found a patch of sunlight
In a field of green delight
Dancing with the dawn light
Warmth that feels just right

[Verse 2]
Wind whispering secrets
Through the leaves and petals sweet
Nature's symphony repeats
Moving to the heartbeat

[Chorus]
Sunflower days
Golden rays
In this maze
We stay

[Verse 3]
Smiling faces all around
Beneath the skies so profound
Joy in every sight and sound
Love in the ground

[Chorus]
Sunflower days
Golden rays
In this maze
We stay

[Bridge]
Petals reaching for the sky
Hopes and dreams they fly
Touching clouds way up high
In the blink of an eye
title: Sunflower Days
